item.title: ChatGPT recovers after being hit by outages, OpenAI says
item.description: The OpenAI issue was caused by an "upstream provider," according to the artificial intelligence organization.

item.title: Manmohan Singh, India's former prime minister, dies at 92
item.description: A mild-mannered technocrat, Manmohan Singh became one of India's longest-serving prime ministers. He was chosen to fill the role by Sonia Gandhi, the ...

item.title: Richard Parsons, executive who led Time Warner and Citigroup, dies at age 76
item.description: Richard Parsons was known as a skilled negotiator, a diplomat and a crisis manager.

item.title: Is multitasking a myth? Here's what research shows.
item.description: Busy lives have many of us juggling multiple tasks at once, but is that really multitasking? Here's what expert Linda Stone has learned about the myth...
